pages.title: 熔岩海绵
pages.text: $(italic)手持湿漉漉的海绵的时候，你想着熔岩是不是也有类似的用具。everyn though you haven't stumbled across one yet, that hasn't stopped you from inventing one, of course.$(br2)This should make navigation in the depths of the world and beyond that hellish portal much easier.

pages.title: 基座配方
pages.text: ...or so you thought, until you realized that the lava-soaked sponge also has an $(italic)unfortunate$() side effect.$(br)You should have guessed.

pages.title: Furnace Fuel
pages.text: The 熔岩海绵 can be used as highly efficient fuel in the furnace, drying it in the process.
